properties.name: Casa Ciabattini

description.value:
Historic, traditional establishment serving excellent home-style cooking. 2 minutes' walk, just around the corner. Lunch and dinner Monday to Friday, closed Saturday, Sunday lunch only.: High-quality trattoria with many house-made specialties (pasta, bread and desserts), excellent wine selection and pleasant décor. One of our favorite spots! 2 minutes' walk, just around the corner. Lunch and dinner Monday to Saturday, closed Sunday.
